alert.note: Alert for Bowie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Little River, northwestern Cass, Bowie and northern Morris Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winthrop to near Us 259 And I 30 Intersection. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, Ashdown, New Boston, Foreman, Nash, Hooks, De Kalb, Naples, Redwater, Maud, Omaha, Red Lick, Wilton, Ogden, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Dalby Springs, Richmond, Leary and Douglassville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
